timeline.bodyText: Setting up the owner reference for the preview runner statefulset as the preview manager pod so that when that pod gets deleted we recreate stateful sets.
timeline.author: sagarkapare

replies.bodyText: Why the owner is the pod?? If the pod deleted then the runner statefulset will be deleted?? If that what you wanted? If the pod is deleted manually to force a restart, the preview runners statefulset will be deleted too?
replies.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: Yes this is done intentionally. Preview runner statefulset does not store any state anyway. Deleting the runners when preview manager deleted make sure both are running with same version of the code. Also in absence of this deletion, preview manager can create new statefulset for runner and pods from which can try polling for preview request for short amount of time.
replies.author: sagarkapare

replies.bodyText: So, this means if the preview manager pod get restarted due to failure node or OOM, then it kills all running previews? Seems like not a very good design.
replies.author: chtyim
